  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085939</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sample classroom floor plans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beispielklassenzimmer-Fußbodenpläne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plans d'étage de salle de classe témoin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plantas de assoalho da sala de aula da amostra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programmi di pavimento dell'aula del campione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδια ορόφων τάξεων δειγμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Planes de suelo de la sala de clase de la muestra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Basic floor plans and explanations for a traditional classroom, discussions/debates, a horseshoe arrangement, and centers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Fußbodenpläne und -erklärungen 
für ein traditionelles Klassenzimmer, discussions/debates, eine 
Hufeisenanordnung und Mitten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plans et explications d'étage de base pour une 
salle de classe traditionnelle, discussions/debates, un agencement en 
fer à cheval, et des centres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plantas e explanações básicas de assoalho para 
uma sala de aula tradicional, discussions/debates, um arranjo em 
ferradura, e centros.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programmi e spiegazioni di pavimento di base per 
un'aula tradizionale, discussions/debates, una disposizione a ferro di
cavallo ed i centri.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασικές σχέδια ορόφων και εξηγήσεις για μια 
παραδοσιακή τάξη, συζητήσεις/διαμάχες, μια πεταλοειδής ρύθμιση, 
και κέντρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Planes y explicaciones básicos de suelo para una 
sala de clase tradicional, discussions/debates, un arreglo de 
herradura, y los centros.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
